backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling submission storage, user profiles, access control, and media blob integration with role-based authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure containing no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing short summaries of key frontend source files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes with global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app root and main entry script.
frontend/README.md: Project overview describing features, admin credentials, tech stack, and structure of the AudioDrop frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with public and admin routes wrapped in theme provider and AppShell.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAudio: Allows admins to download an audio ExternalBlob as a .webm file with loading and toast feedback.
Streams and plays an audio ExternalBlob via a direct URL with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMedia: Downloads audio or video ExternalBlob files based on media type, generating appropriate MIME types and filenames.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminVideo: Streams and displays a video ExternalBlob with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/DeleteSubm: Shows a confirmation dialog and deletes a submission via mutation, navigating back on success.
frontend/src/components/admin/ExportTool: Exports submission metadata to CSV client-side and provides a placeholder for ZIP media export.
Route guard verifying admin session and showing access denied UI or the protected content.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper with header, navigation, footer, and admin session-aware controls.
frontend/src/components/AudioRecorder.ts: Provides an in-browser audio recorder with start, pause, resume, stop, and attach features, enforcing max duration and returning a File on completion.
frontend/src/components/LocalCaptchaChal: Renders a simple math-based CAPTCHA requiring users to solve an addition problem before continuing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioRecorder.ts: React hook managing audio recording with MediaRecorder, including start/stop/pause and timers, returning the recorded Blob and state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, handling login status, stored identities, and provider setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, submissions, and admin session/login actions.
frontend/src/index.css: TailwindCSS base styles with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/adminApi.ts: Client-side admin auth utilities using hardcoded credentials with sessionStorage-based session management.
frontend/src/lib/audioValidation.ts: Utilities for validating audio files, size limits, allowed formats, and formatting durations and file sizes.
frontend/src/lib/csrf.ts: SessionStorage-based placeholder CSRF token storage and header attachment helpers.
frontend/src/lib/downloads.ts: Helpers to trigger file downloads from blobs or URLs using temporary anchor elements.
frontend/src/lib/safeText.ts: Text sanitization helpers for stripping HTML, truncating, and escaping strings.
frontend/src/lib/submissionFormat.ts: Functions for formatting timestamps, sizes, durations, and generating or displaying submission IDs.
frontend/src/lib/videoValidation.ts: Provides deprecated video file validation utilities including size, MIME type, and extension checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays and filters all submissions for admins, including search, sorting, and export tools.
Provides the admin authentication form and handles login logic.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: UI for viewing and editing admin-configurable settings like CAPTCHA and upload limits.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AuditLogPage.ts: Shows audit log filters and placeholder table for tracking admin actions, pending backend support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/SubmissionDetai: Admin page that loads a submission by ID, shows student and media details, and provides media playback, download, and deletion actions.
frontend/src/pages/StudentUploadPage.tsx: Implements the student audio submission form with validation, CAPTCHA flow, and upload handling.
frontend/src/pages/SubmissionSuccessPage: Displays a confirmation screen after a successful submission.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, radius, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
